short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Shows OAuth applications risk in real time

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
AppTotal allows you to analyze OAuth app posture, permissions, and behavior to detect harmful apps and share them with the security community.

Now with our new chrome extension, the risk information is available to you right in the consent screen.

Detect risky apps and prevent phishing in real time, before they get access to your Google, Microsoft or Slack data.
